name: Land it Rocket
description: In this game your goal is to land your rocket safely, but watch out the world is full of danger like mines, lasers and turrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM
